title: The Mystery of William Moore Directly Download
description:
Embark on a plot-driven, walking simulator -puzzle video game with an amazing plot and surprise ending. You’re sent to find a secret machine from your mysterious grandfather’s house after his passing.
Will you be able to find the secret machine and unlock its powers? Or will you get lost in the Victorian home? Play in a historical Victorian house. Dig for clues in nooks and crannies. Escape the Backrooms
Find dialogue and puzzle options hidden everywhere. Solve a bunch of puzzles in EACH ROOM! Plus, an overarching puzzle spans the game.Piece together objects and dialogue from each room. Everything comes together for a powerful, satisfying ending.
As you dig deeper in the house, you’ll find more items with an ever more interesting history. Be careful what you touch. If you like mystery, history and crime, you’ll LOVE The Mystery of William Moore. The game is short but sweet.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
